articles.title: The Importance of Salah
articles.content: Salah is the second pillar of Islam...

fatwas.question: Is it permissible to pray at home?
fatwas.answer: It is permissible to pray at home, but it is recommended to pray in congregation...

quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (SAW)
quotes.text: The best of you are those who are best to their families.
